about.headingOne: Drug And Alcohol Rehab Center In New Hampshire
about.textOne: Welcome to Brand North, where we are dedicated to helping individuals on their journey to recovery. Our mission is to provide compassionate, comprehensive care for those struggling with substance use disorders. Located in Nashua, New Hampshire, our facility offers a supportive and welcoming environment where you can discover your true potential and achieve lasting sobriety.
about.headingTwo: Our Approach to Substance Use Disorder
about.textTwo: At Brand North, we employ a comprehensive treatment approach that emphasizes a family-style environment. We focus on educating and involving the client's family in the recovery process, providing personalized treatment plans tailored to the individual needs of each client. Our value-based care model ensures that you receive the highest quality of care, with a focus on your unique journey to healing and recovery.

cta.heading: Start Your Journey To Recovery Today
cta.text: Are you or a loved one struggling with addiction? Discover Health Group is here to help you take the first step towards a healthier, happier life. Our compassionate team is ready to support you through every stage of your recovery journey. Contact us today to learn more about our programs, schedule a visit, or start the admissions process. Your path to recovery begins here.

programs.title: Partial Hospitalization Program (PHP)
programs.description: A day treatment program providing intensive therapy and support, ideal for individuals who need structured care but do not require 24-hour supervision.

programs.title: Intensive Outpatient Program (IOP)
programs.description: A flexible program that allows clients to receive treatment while maintaining their daily responsibilities, including therapy sessions and group activities.

programs.title: Outpatient Program (OP)
programs.description: Includes individual therapy and one group session per week, suitable for those who require ongoing support with less intensive treatment.

services.heading: Services
services.description: Brand North offers a variety of additional services to support your recovery journey:

services.title: Medication-Assisted Treatment (MAT)
services.description: Plans to implement mental health outpatient care and psychiatric services, including medications such as Suboxone, Methadone, Vivitrol, and Subutex.

services.title: Sober Living Placement
services.description: Strong partnership with Sober Living ensures access to supportive, substance-free housing environments.

services.title: Transportation Coordination
services.description: Assistance in arranging transportation services to ensure clients can attend their sessions.

services.title: Nutritional Counseling
services.description: A nutritionist provides guidance on healthy eating habits and diet plans, with snacks and lunch available for full day treatment clients.

services.title: Case Management
services.description: Assistance with resume building, job search, court paperwork, and accessing community resources to help clients develop life skills and achieve long-term stability.
